page.title: 08TRANSPORT
page.content: TRANSPORT. Buxted has a station on the Uckfield London line. It takes about 100 minutes to get to the city.A number of local people commute to London each day. There is no bus service that serves the Buxted community although a small portion of our block is served by the Brighton to Tunbridge Wells bus service. Some people commute via Haywards Heath Station some twelve miles away inorder to take advantage of a faster and more frequent service on the Brighton line. Every family in our school has a car.
